mapper.select: SELECT MATERIAL_ID AS materialId , MATERIAL_CODE AS materialCode , MATERIAL_NAME AS materialName, MATERIAL_SPECS AS materialSpecs , MATERIAL_ABBR AS materialAbbr , MATERIAL_UNIT AS materialUnit, MATERIAL_TYPE AS materialType , MATERIAL_STATE AS materialState , UPDATE_DATE AS Updatedate, CREATE_USER AS createUser FROM DATA_MATERIAL WHERE 1 = 1
